item.title: How I Created "Pizza Peers"
item.description: Hi, I am Pandaqi, an indie game developer who almost exclusively creates local multiplayer games. I’ve been trying to create those kinds of games for several years now, which means I’ve hit every obstacle and roadblock imaginable.
